Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Cylix
Description: Cylix with semispherical foot, wide mouth, rounded rim and body with curvature in its upper third. At the top, it has a painted decoration in black and yellow colours on the basis of vertical lines. Paste of a reddish colour and surface with only a few remnants of the reddish-coloured coating.
